alert.note: Alert for Scott (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 06 at 6:51PM EDT by NWS Knoxville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Sullivan, northeastern Hawkins, northeastern Greene and southeastern Scott Counties through 730 PM EDT... At 651 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 7 miles west of Gate City to 6 miles south of Surgoinsville. Movement was east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Kingsport, Gate City, Weber City, Church Hill, Mount Carmel, Baileyton, Sullivan Gardens, Hiltons, Jearoldstown and Bays Mountain Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
